post:
About My Custom Hosting

My Custom Hosting was registered back in 2009 and provided hosting only to customers known to the business in real life.  With almost 8 years experience in the hosting industry you should feel right at home with My Custom Hosting.  We aim to offer your the most features at the lowest price possible.  With multiple offsite backup locations, CloudFlare, Softaculous and Nginx, and now VPS, we feel we are almost there but if you have any suggestions to a feature we should add to our line-up please let us know!  We are happy to announce our new VPS offering to this great community!

 

 

Limited Time:  Offer valid for next 4 orders! or the end of May whichever comes first!

 

 


Special VPS  (click here to order)

  • 40 60 GB Disk Space (SSD Cached) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
  • 400 600 GB Data Transfer - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
  • 2 3 Gb Guaranteed RAM (no vSwap or Burst RAM) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
  • 1 IPv4 Address
  • Fair usage of 2 3 cores - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
  • OpenVZ
  • Lenoir, North Carolina
$7 a month, each and every month!
